page.title: 08Living in an isolated area.
page.content: We interviewed a lady in Prestwood. There are no shops and hardly any houses.She likes living there because it's peaceful,quiet countryside with lots of animals around. She has letters delivered every day, milk every other day and papers aren't delivered. She has only been snowed in once in nine years,but she keeps the food cupboard well stocked during the winter in case. She has a car and gets her groceries once a week. She thinks it's easier to live in an isolated place now than 50 years ago because the roads are better and more people have cars. She thinks the disadvantages of living there are: lack of main drains,no gas, worrying about being cut off in the winter.She would like more neighbours.
